articles.title: EU leaders reaffirm support for Ukraine, squabble over gas cap - Reuters
articles.description: European Union leaders on Friday agreed to give more financial and military aid to Ukraine, but a full day of talks in Prague's ornate royal castle seemed to bring them no closer to deciding on whether or how to cap gas prices.
articles.content: PRAGUE, Oct 7 (Reuters) - European Union leaders on Friday agreed to give more financial and military aid to Ukraine, but a full day of talks in Prague's ornate royal castle seemed to bring them no c… [+4458 chars]

articles.title: Covid wave looms in Europe as booster campaign makes slow start - CNN
articles.description: A new Covid-19 wave appears to be brewing in Europe as cooler weather arrives, with public health experts warning that vaccine fatigue and confusion over types of shots available will likely limit booster uptake.

articles.title: The Western Cape has another plan to move away from load shedding - BusinessTech
articles.description: The Western Cape government has been on an investment drive to Europe, exploring ways to make the province more energy efficient.
articles.content:
